---
title: "Manage roles"
---

Managing roles is crucial for maintaining a secure and well-organized environment. Assign, update, and view permissions for different roles, and ensure that each role has appropriate access to the resources they need. 

## Prerequisites

To perform these steps, you must hold the `Customer Admin` role^1^. 

::: {.column-margin}
**Learn more:**

^1^ [Users (Supported roles)](managing-users.qmd#supported-roles)

|   [Manage users (User roles)](manage-users.qmd#user-roles)
:::
